mapper.select: SELECT A.C_NO AS CNO, A.C_TITLE AS TITLE, A.C_CONTENTS AS CONTENTS, A.C_FILENAME AS FILENAME, A.C_VIEW AS VIEWCOUNT, TO_CHAR(A.C_REGDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI')REGDATE, A.C_CATEGORY AS CATEGORY, A.C_INFOCATEGORY AS INFOCATEGORY, A.U_ID AS UNO, NVL(B.L_COUNT, 0) AS LCOUNT FROM WEBBOARD A LEFT JOIN (SELECT C_NO, SUM(L_COUNT)L_COUNT FROM WEBLIKE GROUP BY C_NO) B ON A.C_NO=B.C_NO WHERE A.C_NO = #{cno}
